title: Potential scripter on EUW
body:
I'm not sure if this is the right place for this but I found a scripter on EUW with the summoner name "benouille". I played with him a few days ago and because people in the game were speculating if he was using a script I started to investigate. It seems that he is playing Kog'Maw and Xerath and that he plays in a very strange style. He is able to perfectly Orb-walk with Kog'Maw with 3-4 Attack speed and has an incredible winrate overall. I would be happy if you could investigate a bit further and ban him if he really is scripting.

His op.gg profile link: [http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=benouille](http://http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=benouille)

I do fully understand that I could be wrong and that this player is a professional player smurfing on this account, but his champion pool is very similar to a lot of confirmed former scripters.

Thank you for reading, and it would mean the world to me if you could respond with any feedback.

replies.body:
1. Falsches Forum
2. Du kannst auch Deutsch schreiben
3. Das öffentliche Anprangern und Beschuldigen ohne handfeste Beweise ist nicht erlaubt
